Constructor Detail

Market

public Market(int baked_count,
              int meat_count,
              int dairy_count,
              int fruit_count,
              int veg_count,
              int bev_count)
Default constructor. Initializes market parameters.

Parameters:
baked_count - Number of stalls selling baked goods.
meat_count - Number of stalls selling meat.
dairy_count - Number of stalls selling dairy products.
fruit_count - Number of stalls selling fruits.
veg_count - Number of stalls selling vegetables.
bev_count - Number of stalls selling beverages.
Method Detail

addNewCustomer

public void addNewCustomer()
Method called when a new customer is to be added to the Market. This method calls a different method to add a customer to a queue.

checkQueues

public void checkQueues()
Method to check and adjust the queues for every stall. If a customer is removed from a queue it is added to a different queue.

checkWaitingArea

public int checkWaitingArea()
Method to check waiting area and try to place the customers in waiting area in an available queue.

Returns:
Returns the size of the waiting area after it is processed.

getAverageCustomerTime

public int getAverageCustomerTime()
Method to calculate and return the average time spent by customers in the market.

Returns:
Returns the average time spent.

getCustomersEntered

public int getCustomersEntered()
Method to retrieve number of customers who have entered the market.

Returns:
Total number of customers who entered the market.

getCustomersLeft

public int getCustomersLeft()
Method to retrieve number of customers who have left the market.

Returns:
Total number of customers who left the market.

getUnits

public int getUnits()
Method to retrieve number of units for the market.

Returns:
Number of units occupied by market.

hasUnits

public boolean hasUnits()
Method to check if the market has available units.

Returns:
True if there is space, otherwise false.

printStallStats

public void printStallStats()
Method to print a set of stats for each stall. This method calls another method pertaining to each different stall.
